It‚Äôs time for the Senate to vote on this bill and stop the inhumane treatment of children and families under the custody of CBP.

The House recently passed my bill, the Humanitarian Standards for Individuals in CBP Custody Act to ensure that children and families detained by CBP receive basic sanitation standards for a life with dignity.

The Trump administration argued in federal court that migrant children in federal custody do not need toothbrushes and soap for basic hygiene.
